name: Bookbound Brigade
summary: Bookbound Brigade is about beating the hell out of historical and literary characters you studied in school by leading a dream team of real and fictional heroes through a 2D side-scrolling platform-adventure.
info:
• 别名: 书卷旅队
  • 平台: PS4
  • 平台: Nintendo Switch
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: Platform adventure
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 2020-01-30
  • 官方网站: https://www.bookbound-brigade.com
  • 开发: Digital Tales USA LLC
  • 发行: Intragames Co.,Ltd
